00031 set_error_handler(create_function('$x, $y', 'throw new Exception($y, $x);'), E_ALL & ~E_NOTICE);

00053 /**

00058  * @package    Bee

00061  */
00062 class Bee_Dispatch
00063 {

00065      * Application config
00066      * @var array

00072      * @var string

00074     protected $_baseURL = null;

00076     /**
00077      * Determines if exceptions should escape the Bee_Core object or be released to
00078      * the method caller.
00079      * @var boolean
00080      */
00081     protected $_throwExceptions = false;
00082 
00083     /**
00084      * Determines if exceptions should be logged.
00085      * @var boolean
00086      */
00087     protected $_logExceptions = false;
00088 
00089     /**
00090      * Determines if exceptions should be emailed to an administrator.
00091      * @var boolean
00092      */
00093     protected $_emailExceptions = false;

00099     protected $_defaultAction = 'index';

00119     /**
00120      * Constructor
00121      *
00122      * @return void
00123      */
00124     public function __construct()
00125     {
00126         global $CONFIG;
00127         $conf =& Bee_Registry('config');
00128         $conf = $this->config =& $CONFIG;
00129 
00130         $this->_setupExceptionHandling();
00131 
00132         $this->_baseURL = preg_replace( '#index\.php.*#i', '', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] );
00133 
00134         Bee_Display::factory( $this->config['display_backend'] );
00135     }

00137     /**
00138      * Sets the throwExceptions flag and retreives the current status.
00139      *
00140      * By default, exceptions are caught by the Bee_Dispatch class. Enabling
00141      * this flag will allow them to pass back to the caller.
00142      *
00143      * @param boolean $flag
00144      * @return void
00145      */
00146     public function throwExceptions( $flag = null )
00147     {
00148         if( $flag !== null )
00149         {
00150             $this->_throwExceptions = (bool) $flag;
00151             return $this;
00152         }
00153 
00154         return $this->_throwExceptions;
00155     }
00156 
00157     /**
00158      * Sets the logExceptions flag and retreives the current status.
00159      *
00160      * By default, exceptions are caught by the Bee_Dispatch class.
00161      * Enabling this flag will additionally log them to a file defined
00162      * by $CONFIG['exception_log'] (in app/Config.php).
00163      *
00164      * @param boolean $flag
00165      * @return void
00166      */
00167     public function logExceptions( $flag = null )
00168     {
00169         if( $flag !== null )
00170         {
00171             $this->_logExceptions = (bool) $flag;
00172             return $this;
00173         }
00174 
00175         return $this->_logExceptions;
00176     }
00177 
00178     /**
00179      * Sets the emailExceptions flag and retreives the current status.
00180      *
00181      * By default, exceptions are caught by the Bee_Dispatch class.
00182      * Enabling this flag will additionally email them to an administrator
00183      * (or whoever's email is passed in as the 2nd parameter).
00184      *
00185      * @param boolean $flag
00186      * @return void
00187      */
00188     public function emailExceptions( $flag = null, $emailAddress = 'nobody' )
00189     {
00190         if( $flag !== null )
00191         {
00192             $this->_emailExceptions = (bool) $flag;
00193             return $this;
00194         }
00195 
00196         return $this->_emailExceptions;
00197     }
00198 
00199     /**
00200      * Starts execution of the Colony framework.
00201      *
00202      * @throws Bee_Exception
00203      * @return void
00204      */
00205     public function run()
00206     {
00207         try
00208         {
00209             $this->_dispatch();
00210         }
00211         catch( Exception $e )
00212         {
00213             // Log the exception if we're configured to do that
00214             if( $this->logExceptions() )
00215             {
00216                 if(!isset( $this->controller )) {
00217                     require_once('Bee/Controller.php');
00218                     call_user_func_array( array( new Bee_Controller($this->config), 'logException'), array($e) );
00219                 } else {
00220                     call_user_func_array( array( $this->controller, 'logException'), array($e) );
00221                 }
00222             }
00223             
00224             // Email the exception if we're configured to do that
00225             if( $this->emailExceptions() )
00226             {
00227                 if(!isset( $this->controller )) {
00228                     require_once('Bee/Controller.php');
00229                     call_user_func_array( array( new Bee_Controller($this->config), 'emailException'), array($e) );
00230                 } else {
00231                     call_user_func_array( array( $this->controller, 'emailException'), array($e) );
00232                 }
00233             }
00234              
00235             // Throw the exception if we're configured to do that
00236             if( $this->throwExceptions() )
00237             {
00238                 throw $e;
00239             }
00240             else
00241             {
00242                 if( file_exists( 'app/views/error.tpl' ) )
00243                 {
00244                     $error_message = preg_replace( '/mysql_connect\([^)]+?\)/im', 'mysql_connect()', $e );
00245                     Bee_Display::display( 'error', array( 'config' => $this->config,
00246                                                           'error' => $error_message,
00247                                                           'exception' => $e ) );
00248                 }
00249                 else
00250                 {
00251                     print '<pre>';
00252                     print $e;
00253                     print '</pre>';
00254                 }
00255             }
00256         }
00257     }
00258 
00259     /**
00260      * Dispatches an HTTP request to its assigned controller
00261      *
00262      * @throws Bee_Dispatch_Exception
00263      * @return void
00264      */
00265     protected function _dispatch()
00266     {
00267         $this->_loadRouting();
00268         $this->_splitURI();
00269 
00270         // Check that controller class exists
00271         if( !file_exists( 'app/controllers/' . $this->action . '.php' ) )
00272         {
00273             if( $this->throwExceptions() || !file_exists( 'app/views/404.tpl' ) )
00274             {
00275                 header( 'HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found' );
00276                 throw new Bee_Dispatch_Exception( "Controller ($this->action) not found" );
00277             }
00278             else
00279             {
00280                 header( 'HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found' );
00281                 Bee_Display::display( '404' );
00282                 return false;
00283             }
00284         }
00285 
00286         // Instantiate the action controller
00287         require_once 'controllers/' . $this->action . '.php';
00288         $action = ucfirst( $this->action ) . '_Controller';
00289         $this->controller = $controller = new $action( array_merge( $this->config, array( 'baseURL' => $this->_baseURL ) ) );
00290 
00291         // If a method wasn't defined in the URI, grab the default from the controller
00292         if( $this->method == '' )
00293             $this->method = $controller->defaultMethod;
00294 
00295         // Check that method call exists
00296         if( !method_exists( $controller, $this->method ) )
00297             throw new Bee_Dispatch_Exception( 'Method not found: ' . $action . '::' . $this->method );
00298 
00299         // Save the local vars to the controller
00300         $controller->action = $this->action;
00301         $controller->method = $this->method;
00302         $controller->extra = $this->extra;
00303         $controller->_baseURL = $this->_baseURL;
00304 
00305         // Run the method
00306         if ( method_exists( $controller, "_setup" ) )
00307             $controller->_setup();
00308         $controller->{$this->method}( $this->extra );
00309         $controller->completeDispatch();
00310 
00311         // Save the local vars to the controller
00312         $controller->action = $this->action;
00313         $controller->method = $this->method;
00314         $controller->extra = $this->extra;
00315         $controller->_baseURL = $this->_baseURL;
00316 
00317         // Display back to the browser
00318         Bee_Display::display( $this->action . '/' . $this->method, get_object_vars( $controller ) );
00319     }
00320 
00321     /**
00322      * Splits the HTTP request URI into action, method, extra data. Applies routing.
00323      *
00324      * @return void
00325      */
00326     protected function _splitURI()
00327     {
00328         // Clean the URI of excess data
00329         $method_string = str_replace( 'index.php', '', $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] );
00330         $baseurl = preg_quote( $this->_baseURL );
00331         $method_string = preg_replace( "#^$baseurl#", '', $method_string );
00332         $method_string = preg_replace( '#\?.*#', '', $method_string );
00333 
00334         // Apply routing
00335         if( isset( $this->config['routing'] ) )
00336         {
00337             foreach( $this->config['routing'] as $pattern => $mapping )
00338             {
00339                 // Check if the URI matches this routing pattern
00340                 if( preg_match( $pattern, $method_string, $matches ) )
00341                 {
00342                     if( isset( $mapping['action'] ) )
00343                     {
00344                         // If the mapping value is numeric, assign that part of the pattern
00345                         // Otherwise, it's just the value of the mapping
00346                         if( is_numeric( $mapping['action'] ) )
00347                             $this->action = $matches[$mapping['action']];
00348                         else
00349                             $this->action = $mapping['action'];
00350 
00351                     }
00352 
00353                     if( isset( $mapping['method'] ) )
00354                     {
00355                         if( is_numeric( $mapping['method'] ) )
00356                             $this->method = $matches[$mapping['method']];
00357                         else
00358                             $this->method = $mapping['method'];
00359 
00360                     }
00361 
00362                     if( isset( $mapping['extra'] ) )
00363                     {
00364                         if ( is_array( $mapping['extra'] ) ) {
00365                             $this->extra = array();
00366                             foreach( $mapping['extra'] as $n ) {
00367                                 $temp = null;
00368                                 if ( is_numeric( $n ) )
00369                                     $temp = ( array_key_exists( $n, $matches ) ) ? $matches[$n] : null;
00370                                 else
00371                                     $temp = ( !empty( $n ) ) ? $n : null;
00372                                 if ( !is_null( $temp ) )
00373                                     $this->extra[] = $temp;
00374                             }
00375                             if ( count( $this->extra ) <= 0 )
00376                                 $this->extra = null;
00377                         } else if ( is_numeric( $mapping['extra'] ) )
00378                             $this->extra = ( array_key_exists( $mapping['extra'], $matches ) ) ? $matches[$mapping['extra']] : null;
00379                         else
00380                             $this->extra = ( !empty( $mapping['extra'] ) ) ? $mapping['extra'] : null;
00381 
00382                     }
00383 
00384                     // Don't do any more URI splitting if we've found a match
00385                     return;
00386                 }
00387             }
00388 
00389         }
00390 
00391         //$tokens = explode( '/', $method_string );
00392         $tokens = array();
00393         if ( ( $pos = strpos( $method_string, "/" ) ) !== false ) {
00394             $tokens[0] = substr( $method_string, 0, $pos );
00395             $method_string = substr( $method_string, $pos + 1 );
00396             if ( ( $pos = strpos( $method_string, "/" ) ) !== false ) {
00397                 $tokens[1] = substr( $method_string, 0, $pos );
00398                 $method_string = substr( $method_string, $pos + 1 );
00399                 if ( ( $pos = strpos( $method_string, "/" ) ) !== false ) {
00400                     $tokens[2] = explode( "/", $method_string );
00401                 } else {
00402                     $tokens[2] = $method_string;
00403                 }
00404             } else {
00405                 $tokens[1] = $method_string;
00406             }
00407         } else {
00408             $tokens[0] = $method_string;
00409         }
00410 
00411         // Get the action
00412         if( empty( $tokens[0] ) )
00413             $this->action = $this->_defaultAction;
00414         else
00415             $this->action = $tokens[0];
00416 
00417         // Get the method
00418         if( empty( $tokens[1] ) )
00419             $this->method = '';
00420         else
00421             $this->method = $tokens[1];
00422 
00423         // Get the extra data
00424         if( empty( $tokens[2] ) )
00425             $this->extra = null;
00426         else
00427             $this->extra = $tokens[2];
00428     }
00429 
00430     /**
00431      * Loads routing from app/Routing.php  Note: routes were
00432      * previously stored in app/Config.php but moved so that
00433      * they could be versioned.
00434      *
00435      * @return void
00436      */
00437     protected function _loadRouting()
00438     {
00439         if( file_exists( './app/Routing.php' ) )
00440         {
00441             include( './app/Routing.php' );
00442 
00443             if( isset($ROUTING) )
00444             {
00445                 global $CONFIG;
00446                 $CONFIG['routing'] = $ROUTING;
00447             }
00448         }
00449     }
00450 
00451     private function _setupExceptionHandling()
00452     {
00453         // Exception logging
00454         if( !isset($this->config['log_exceptions']) || $this->config['log_exceptions'] !== false )
00455         {
00456             $this->logExceptions( true );
00457         }
00458 
00459         // Exception emailing
00460         if( isset($this->config['email_exceptions']) && $this->config['email_exceptions'] )
00461         {
00462             $this->emailExceptions( true );
00463         }
00464 
00465         // Exception throwing
00466         if( !isset($this->config['throw_exceptions']) || $this->config['throw_exceptions'] )
00467         {
00468             $this->throwExceptions( true );
00469         }
00470     }

00474 class Bee_Dispatch_Exception extends Bee_Exception
